DayStepper.name: value
DayStepper.description: Sets the selected day timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339.

DayStepper.name: readonly
DayStepper.description: Disables days from being stepped through without visual changes.

DayStepper.name: step
DayStepper.description: Sets how many days are stepped through at each button click.

DayStepper.name: max
DayStepper.description: Sets the maximum day timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the future that can be selected.

DayStepper.name: min
DayStepper.description: Sets the minimum day timestamp ISO 8601 / RFC 3339 in the past that can be selected.

DayStepper.name: sizing
DayStepper.description: Sets the size of children / spacing relative to the font size of the DayStepper.

DayStepper.name: calendar
DayStepper.description: Alters the calendar used for calculations / formatting via Temporal Calendar Codes.

DayStepper.name: locale
DayStepper.description: Alters the locale used for displaying internationalized text via RFC 5646 / BCP 47 language tags.

DayStepper.name: day
DayStepper.description: Alters how a displayed day is formatted.

DayStepper.name: month
DayStepper.description: Alters how a displayed month is formatted.

DayStepper.name: weekday
DayStepper.description: Alters how a displayed weekday is formatted.

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const value = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";
</script>

<DayStepper palette="accent" {value} disabled />
snippets.title: DayStepper Disabled

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const value = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";
</script>

<DayStepper palette="accent" {value} readonly />
snippets.title: DayStepper Readonly

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const value = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";

    const max = "2021-11-13[u-ca=gregory]";
    const min = "2021-11-07[u-ca=gregory]";
</script>

<DayStepper palette="accent" {max} {min} {value} />
snippets.title: DayStepper Maximum + Minimum

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const value = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";
</script>

<DayStepper palette="accent" step={3} {value} />
snippets.title: DayStepper Step

snippets.script:
<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    const value = "2021-11-10[u-ca=gregory]";
</script>

<DayStepper
    palette="accent"
    day="numeric"
    month="numeric"
    weekday="short"
    {value}
/>
snippets.title: DayStepper Custom Format

snippets.title: DayStepper Sizing

data.render:
DayStepper

DayStepper is a Widget that lets users increment / decrement the currently provided day by a set number.

Imports

<script>
    import {DayStepper} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

Disabled

You can disable all interactivity via the disabled property.

Readonly

You can disable interactivity without changing the visuals via the readonly property.

Maximum + Minimum

You can set maximum and minimum range of steppable days via the maximum / minimum properties.

Step

You can control how many days the buttons increment / decrement via the step property.

Custom Format

You can customize how the day and month components of the current timestamp is displayed via the day, weekday, and month properties respectively.

Sizing

You can alter the overall spacing / sizing look and feel via the sizing property.
